Rulings.Base: 1. Sending "Blackwing - Kalut the Moon Shadow" to the GY is a cost to activate its effect.\n2. The effect of "Blackwing - Kalut the Moon Shadow" does not target.\n3. You can send "Blackwing - Kalut the Moon Shadow" to the GY during either player's turn, as it is a Quick Effect.
